name: Vegan Pasta Salad
description: This Vegan Pasta Salad is perfect for summer potlucks. Pasta, fresh vegetables and vegan cheese cubes are tossed in a briny vinaigrette to create an incredible side dish you will make again and again!
recipeIngredient: 16 ounces uncooked farfalle or rotini pasta
1/2 large red bell pepper, seeded and sliced
1 block vegan cheddar cheese, cut into cubes (I used Violife brand)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to package instructions, then drain and rinse in cold water. Add cooked pasta to a large bowl and toss in a few teaspoons of olive oil, so it doesn't stick together.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to package instructions, then drain and rinse in cold water. Add cooked pasta to a large bowl and toss in a few teaspoons of olive oil, so it doesn't stick together.

recipeInstructions.text: While the pasta cooks, chop and slice all the vegetables and cheese. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: While the pasta cooks, chop and slice all the vegetables and cheese. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk all dressing ingredients in a medium bowl until well combined. You can also simply add all the dressing ingredients to a jar with a lid, and shake until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk all dressing ingredients in a medium bowl until well combined. You can also simply add all the dressing ingredients to a jar with a lid, and shake until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: To the bowl with the pasta, add the vegetables, cheese and dressing. Stir to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: To the bowl with the pasta, add the vegetables, cheese and dressing. Stir to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the bowl and chill for at least 30 minutes if possible before serving. It will stay good for up to 5 days. Right before serving, sprinkle with Vegan Parmesan, if desired. Enjoy!
